metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8934 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The copy_from_lzss_window function in archive_read_support_format_rar.c inlibarchive 3.2.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (out-of-bounds heap read) via a crafted rar file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8934` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
bsdtar - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libarchive package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2').
